heading: ========== ~~~~~ ** Date Calculator ** ~~~~~ ==========
welcome:
Welcome to Date Calculator! 📅
A nifty tool that will help you calculate the distance in whole days between two dates!
explanation:
All you have to do is to input two dates in *DD/MM/YYYY* format (**important**) 
Let this program handle the rest!
Press CTRL+C to kill at any time 🔫
dateInputErr:
❌ You entered an incorrect date ❌
Make sure you follow the dd/mm/yyyy format:
distance:
Distance between $date1$ and $date2$ is $distance$ days. 
Bye 👋
